about_the_game:
Savage is a single-player action game that allows players to experience MMORPG-style boss battles. Two characters, the Paladin and the Archer, each fulfill their roles and take on formidable enemies in battle.
This game, which focuses on boss battles, requires no tedious pre-battle preparations or boring wait times for matchmaking. Dive into ultimate boss fights immediately after starting the game!

No tedious preparations! Dive straight into boss battles

  • In MMORPGs, leveling up and gathering equipment are usually necessary preparations. However, in this game, which focuses on boss battles, players can challenge a boss immediately after starting the game.
  • There are about 30 types of boss battles available, including high-difficulty battles that could be considered endgame content, all of which can be played solo.
  • There's no need to wait for team members to assemble. You won't be bothered by the need to communicate with other players. Enjoy battling formidable foes on your own to your heart's content.

A unique gaming experience controlling two characters simultaneously

  • The battle progresses in real time, with two characters each fulfilling their roles to defeat the boss. Typically, the character not controlled by the player is either managed by the CPU or another player, but this game is different. You will control both characters simultaneously in real time.
  • For example, in terms of movement controls, the left stick on the gamepad controls the Paladin, while the right stick controls the Archer, allowing intuitive operation of each character with your left and right hands respectively. (Keyboard and mouse controls are also available.)
  • This control scheme enables a game experience similar to MMORPGs, where the battle progresses from multiple character perspectives simultaneously, even though it's a single-player game.
